question: You eat at your college cafeteria at lunch time every day. However, you think it needs some improvements. Write a letter to the college magazine. In your letter: explain what you like about the cafeteria say what is wrong with it suggest how it could be improved
text: I am writing to you to express problems faced by me as well as other students during lunchtime in the cafeteria.

Although, It has all the basic necessities such as a water cooler yet I am facing various discomforts. The food served by them is very delicious. In addition to it, the people serving the meals are very polite and humble. I love the lunch they fed me. Also, they prepared the item which is in special demand by faculty or students.

Despite these likings, I am too much disappointed with the seating arrangement in the canteen. All the chairs are not properly managed which causes a messy environment in the hall. Furthermore, there are fewer tables due to which many people have to wait for their turn.

I would like to suggest that please arrange more tables so that no one has to wait for their turn to eat meals. Moreover, ask the staff to place all the chairs in proper arrangement. This change will be beneficial to serve us in a good way.
I hope you will look into the matter.
